name: Eremite Axe Vanguard
description:
A member of a loosely-organized mercenary corps from the golden desert sands. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.
These ax-wielding ladies often wade into the slaughter without fear, creating openings for their comrades to capitalize on.
They will sometimes sit by the fireside in their sand-swept homeland and play songs that were lost in that golden sea.

investigation.name: The Eremites
investigation.description: A group of loosely-organized mercenary corps. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.\n"The Eremites" is an umbrella term that people from outside the desert have coined for them. But beneath this name, there are separate entities such as the sellsword group known as the Farrokhzadan and the tribe of Tanit.\nAs a people led not by gods, most of these desert descendants wield their blades to make a living and offer their skills to those who pay.
